name: Remotsy
0:
”Alexa turn on TV”
”Alexa pause DVD”
”Alexa mute TV”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In order to use this skill you need to buy the Remotsy hardware on the Remotsy website or in Amazon.com and also create an account at https://www.remotsy.com

Remotsy allows you to get total control of your home by automating your TV, cable, or other remote controls.

IoT is the next big thing. Now you can use your voice to turn on/off a light, open a door, but ... What about your tv? or What about your video console, and/or your DVD?

What is Remotsy? Remotsy is a Wi-Fi enabled device, using a default firmware. The device is automatically connected to the Remotsy cloud, via the web, you can create controls sequences, and connect the device with Alexa. In a few minutes, you'll be able to use your voice to turn on/off your TV and more! You can mute/unmute, change the channels, change the volume or change the input using the Alexa skill or the public API.

 Now is possible to control your Roku device via wifi and the routines on the Remotsy website.

 Now when you add or delete a control or a routine in the Remotsy website, the change is pushed back to Alexa, you dont need to use the "discovery button" to syncronize the changes.
